title: Fascism crushes popular struggles!
content:
On Saturday night 9/3 in the square Aristotle in Thessaloniki, two young people chased, lynx by a crowd of 200-300 people, basically young, with only criterion their sexual identity.

The transphobic and homophobic attack in Thessaloniki is not an individual incident, but on the contrary It captures the fascism of public life, and even the resonance racist and fascist behaviors at younger ages.

Such We have also noticed in particular in N. Heraklion, where fascist groups are active trying to make the presence them felt. Has an incident of an attack on a minor with a knife In N. Heraklion Square last May, after an anti -fascist course In N. Heraklion. Corresponding case with a knife attack occurred and After another anti -fascist mobilization in Kallithea last year February. Also, let's not forget the murderous attack on Shiraz Safetar to Perissos in August 2023, which is probably He was convened not to seem that he had racist motives.


It's all natural results, When on the lips of the official political scene and its policies 'Serious right' are heard statements that close the eye to fascism and suggest young people to seek enemies who 'alter the culture and values of the nation 'and responsible for the poverty and poverty of the popular strata but taha They are officially condemning fascism. When on social media Provided patterns of masculinity, cruelty, misogyny, racism And in general hate to anything different.

The Young people carry anger towards the system. As long as the popular struggle and The movement does not give real answers to the younger generation towards attack of the system, children and young people will become more prone to such behaviors and ideologies because of their need to belong somewhere. With the logic of 'we against them', they are attracted by the Fascism that offers them exactly all this on the plate.

THE fascism in the form of the far -right is not accidental that it appears More and more worldwide, and especially in our country. It's the long hand of capital and bourgeois class, presented as anti -systemic force in order to hit the struggling people and the minorities and suppress them in the name of the system in which assumed to oppose. Fascism is the extension of capitalist system when it is forced.

Is important to create strong race networks based on resistance In the policy of the system that nourishes fascism but also Solidarity and unity, opposed to fascism and racist ideas. For this reason, youth and parents must politicize, recognize and fight fascism, to confront and respond to such behaviors and ideologies In any space, educational or not.
